sen.j: 小松原法難（こまつばらほうなん）とは、小松原（現千葉県鴨川市）日蓮が襲撃され負傷した事件。
sen.e: Komatsubara Honan is an incident that Nichiren was assaulted and injured in Komatsubara (present-day Kamogawa City, Chiba Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 「小松原にて」の脱字と判断しました。

sen.j: 以前から恨みをもっていた、念仏信者の東条景信が日蓮を襲い、弟子の鏡忍房日暁と信者の工藤吉隆が殺され、日蓮も額を斬られ、左手を骨折、重傷を負う。
sen.e: Kagenobu TOJO who was a believer of nenbutsu (Buddhist invocation) and had held grudge against Nichiren assaulted him, his disciple Nichigyo KYONINBO and a believer Yoshitaka KUDO were killed and Nichiren was also badly injured, slashed in the forehead, left hand broken.

sen.j: 斬りつけた東条景信も落馬し、逃亡、日蓮は難をのがれる。
sen.e: After slashing, Kagenobu TOJO himself fell from a horse and ran away, thus Nichiren managed to survive.

sen.e: In 1263, Nichiren who had been in exile in Izu was pardoned.
